verses.verse: A Song of degrees; of David. Behold, how good and how pleasant [it is] for brothers to dwell together in unity!
[It is] like the precious ointment on the head that ran down on the beard, Aaron's beard, that went down to the mouth of his garments;
like the dew of Hermon that came down on the mountains of Zion; for there the LORD commanded the blessing, life forevermore.
